verses.verse: Again the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> came<WH1961> to me, saying,<WH559>

Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts;<WH6635> I was jealous<WH7065> for Zion<WH6726> with great<WH1419> jealousy,<WH7068> and I was jealous<WH7065> for her with great<WH1419> fury.<WH2534>

Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD;<WH3068> I am returned<WH7725> to Zion,<WH6726> and will dwell<WH7931> in the middle<WH8432> of Jerusalem:<WH3389> and Jerusalem<WH3389> shall be called<WH7121> a city<WH5892> of truth;<WH571> and the mountain<WH2022> of the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> the holy<WH6944> mountain.<WH2022>

Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts;<WH6635> There shall yet<WH5750> old<WH2205> men and old<WH2205> women dwell<WH3427> in the streets<WH7339> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> and every man<WH376> with his staff<WH4938> in his hand<WH3027> for very<WH7230> age.<WH3117>
And the streets<WH7339> of the city<WH5892> shall be full<WH4390> of boys<WH3206> and girls<WH3207> playing<WH7832> in the streets<WH7339> thereof.

Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts;<WH6635> If<WH3588> it be marvelous<WH6381> in the eyes<WH5869> of the remnant<WH7611> of this<WH2088> people<WH5971> in these<WH1992> days,<WH3117> should it also<WH1571> be marvelous<WH6381> in my eyes?<WH5869> said<WH5002> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts.<WH6635>

Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts;<WH6635> Behold,<WH2005> I will save<WH3467> my people<WH5971> from the east<WH4217> country,<WH776> and from the west<WH3996> <WH8121> country;<WH776>

And I will bring<WH935> them, and they shall dwell<WH7931> in the middle<WH8432> of Jerusalem:<WH3389> and they shall be my people,<WH5971> and I will be their God,<WH430> in truth<WH571> and in righteousness.<WH6666>

Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts;<WH6635> Let your hands<WH3027> be strong,<WH2388> you that hear<WH8085> in these<WH428> days<WH3117> these<WH428> words<WH1697> by the mouth<WH6310> of the prophets,<WH5030> which<WH834> were in the day<WH3117> that the foundation<WH3248> of the house<WH1004> of the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> was laid,<WH7760> that the temple<WH1964> might be built.<WH1129>

For before<WH6440> these<WH1992> days<WH3117> there was no<WH3808> hire<WH7939> for man,<WH120> nor<WH369> any hire<WH7939> for beast;<WH929> neither<WH369> was there any peace<WH7965> to him that went<WH3318> out or came<WH935> in because<WH4480> of the affliction:<WH6862> for I set<WH7971> all<WH3605> men<WH120> every one<WH376> against his neighbor.<WH7453>
But now<WH6258> I will not be to the residue<WH7611> of this<WH2088> people<WH5971> as in the former<WH7223> days,<WH3117> said<WH5002> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts.<WH6635>

For the seed<WH2233> shall be prosperous;<WH7965> the vine<WH1612> shall give<WH5414> her fruit,<WH6529> and the ground<WH776> shall give<WH5414> her increase,<WH2981> and the heavens<WH8064> shall give<WH5414> their dew;<WH2919> and I will cause the remnant<WH7611> of this<WH2088> people<WH5971> to possess<WH5157> all<WH3605> these<WH428> things.

And it shall come<WH1961> to pass, that as you were a curse<WH7045> among the heathen,<WH1471> O house<WH1004> of Judah,<WH3063> and house<WH1004> of Israel;<WH3478> so<WH3651> will I save<WH3467> you, and you shall be a blessing:<WH1293> fear<WH3372> not, but let your hands<WH3027> be strong.<WH2388>

For thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts;<WH6635> As I thought<WH2161> to punish<WH7489> you, when your fathers<WH1> provoked me to wrath,<WH7107> said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> and I repented<WH5162> not:
So<WH3651> again<WH7725> have I thought<WH2161> in these<WH428> days<WH3117> to do well<WH3190> to Jerusalem<WH3389> and to the house<WH1004> of Judah:<WH3063> fear<WH3372> you not.

These<WH428> are the things that you shall do;<WH6213> Speak<WH1696> you every man<WH376> the truth<WH571> to his neighbor;<WH7453> execute<WH8199> the judgment<WH4941> of truth<WH571> and peace<WH7965> in your gates:<WH8179>

And let none<WH408> of you imagine evil<WH7451> in your hearts<WH3820> against his neighbor;<WH7453> and love<WH157> no<WH3808> false<WH8267> oath:<WH7621> for all<WH3605> these<WH428> are things that I hate,<WH8130> said<WH5002> the LORD.<WH3068>
And the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> came<WH1961> to me, saying,<WH559>

Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts;<WH6635> The fast<WH6685> of the fourth<WH7243> month, and the fast<WH6685> of the fifth,<WH2549> and the fast<WH6685> of the seventh,<WH7637> and the fast<WH6685> of the tenth,<WH6224> shall be to the house<WH1004> of Judah<WH3063> joy<WH8342> and gladness,<WH8057> and cheerful<WH2896> feasts;<WH4150> therefore love<WH157> the truth<WH571> and peace.<WH7965>
Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts;<WH6635> It shall yet<WH5750> come<WH935> to pass, that there shall come people,<WH5971> and the inhabitants<WH3427> of many<WH7227> cities:<WH5892>

And the inhabitants<WH3427> of one<WH259> city shall go<WH1980> to another,<WH259> saying,<WH559> Let us go<WH3212> speedily<WH1980> to pray<WH2470> before<WH854> <WH6440> the LORD,<WH3068> and to seek<WH1245> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts:<WH6635> I will go<WH3212> also.<WH1571>

Yes, many<WH7227> people<WH5971> and strong<WH6099> nations<WH1471> shall come<WH935> to seek<WH1245> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> in Jerusalem,<WH3389> and to pray<WH2470> before<WH854> <WH6440> the LORD.<WH3068>

Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts;<WH6635> In those<WH1992> days<WH3117> it shall come to pass, that ten<WH6235> men<WH582> shall take<WH2388> hold<WH2388> out of all<WH3605> languages<WH3956> of the nations,<WH1471> even shall take<WH2388> hold<WH2388> of the skirt<WH3671> of him that is a Jew,<WH3064> saying,<WH559> We will go<WH3212> with you: for we have heard<WH8085> that God<WH430> is with you.
